title: Cannot run the client of LoL when update the newest verstion of win10
body: It stucks at the logo beginning ,Looking forward to the reply .

replies.body:
Are you still encountering issues? If so, I suspect our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) may resolve this, since this commonly happens when League is missing specific admin privileges it requires to run properly.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
